item.description:
The Demons invite you to a new format tournament held against arch rivals New York Magpies at the Irish Cultural Center, a fantastic facility located south of Boston in Canton, MA. They have a great field for the games and a bar/restaurant with an outdoor deck overlooking the field for fans.

The schedule for the day is as follows:

12 pm - game 1 - NY 1 vs Bos 1
game 2 - NY 2 vs Bos 2
game 3 - Womens Game (players welcome!)
game 4 - Game 1 loser vs Game 2 loser
game 5 - Game 1 winner vs Game 2 winner

The website for the facility is http://www.irishcultu...

Directions to the field are found at http://www.mapquest.c...

Hope to see you there, this is one of only 2 opportunities to see the Demons play at home this year (next year will see more home games) so dont miss out! Come down for a great day out and support your local footy club!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Demons V New York Metro Tournament
